revised_title: The Role of Protoplasmic Filaments in Leaf Movement and Plasmolysis
tldr: This article discusses the role of protoplasmic filaments in maintaining the continuity of cells in the motile organs of leaves. The author also explores the phenomenon of plasmolysis and the connection between protoplasmic filaments and cell walls. The findings have implications for understanding plant movement and cell biology.
